inclusion.criterion: Relapse after achieving initial remission or failure to achieve initial remission
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Matched related or unrelated donor identified and available
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Recent Bone marrow biopsy and cytogenetic analysis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a pretreatment serum bilirubin < 2 x the institutional ULN
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have an EKG within 42 days prior to registration that shows no significant abnormalities
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a corrected diffusion capacity > 50% prior to the autologous transplant and > 40% prior to the allogeneic transplant
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients with known allergy to etoposide or a history of Grade 3 hemorrhagic cystitis with cyclophosphamide are not eligible
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or breast-feeding women are ineligible due to the known birth defects association with the treatments used in this study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients known to be human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)-positive are ineligible because the concern for opportunistic infection and hematologic reserve are considered to be significantly greater in this population
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No prior autologous or allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplantation
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: no prior autologous or allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplantation

exclusion.criterion: Donor Selection/Evaluation: Related or unrelated HLA identical donors who are in good health and have no contra-indication to donation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease, systemic amyloidosis, and ESRD. She was treated with various regimens including melphalan, prednisone, VAD, thalidomide, and velcade.
